mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW_TABLE (RSEQ, RMSEQ, RUSEQ, RCONTENT, RUP, RDATE, RDELFLAG) VALUES (REVIEW_TABLE_SEQ.nextval,#{mseq},#{useq},#{rcontent},'0',SYSDATE, 'N')
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW_TABLE SET RCONTENT=#{rcontent}, RDATE=SYSDATE WHERE RSEQ=#{rseq}
mapper.delete: UPDATE REVIEW_TABLE SET RDELFLAG='Y' WHERE RSEQ=#{rseq}
mapper.select: SELECT RSEQ, RMSEQ, RUSEQ, RCONTENT, RUP, RDATE, RDELFLAG, RUPUSEQ FROM REVIEW_TABLE WHERE RMSEQ=#{mseq} AND RDELFLAG='N'
SELECT RSEQ, RMSEQ, RUSEQ, RCONTENT, RUP, RDATE, RDELFLAG, RUPUSEQ FROM REVIEW_TABLE WHERE RUSEQ=#{useq} AND RDELFLAG='N'
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW_TABLE SET RUPUSEQ=(RUPUSEQ||'#{useq}')|| ':', RUP=(rup+1) WHERE RSEQ=#{rseq}
UPDATE REVIEW_TABLE SET RUPUSEQ=REPLACE(RUPUSEQ,':#{useq}:',':'), RUP=(rup-1) WHERE RSEQ=#{rseq}
mapper.select: SELECT RSEQ FROM REVIEW_TABLE WHERE RUPUSEQ LIKE '%:#{useq}:%'
